H0.text: A rock sitting at the top of a steep hill is the best example of something that has kinetic energy.

H1.text: A tennis ball rolling across the court is the best example of something that has kinetic energy.

H2.text: A picture hanging on the wall is an example of something that has kinetic energy.

H3.text: A piece of wood before it is burned is the best example of something that has kinetic energy.

A4.text: In physics, the kinetic energy of an object is the form of energy that it possesses due to its motion.

A5.text: Kinetic energy is the movement energy of an object.
